name: No Fusions Allowed
description:
2 Color themed brothers, Blue and Red

Against an enemy named Green

When they combine their powers, they become the best someone can be at parkour.

They are always foiling Green's plans.

Find out about their one such strange journey and experience Parkour.

It is a color based game with 3D platforming, colorful stages and a story for those who love it.

Can you clear all the stages??

Play to find out!

Controls-

W A S D to move around.

SPACEBAR to jump.

SHIFT to run.
